context.title: CND Editor's Child Node Editor
context.description: The child node definition editor is used to create and edit child node definitions for the selected node type definition.

context.title: CND Editor's Child Nodes Table
context.description: The child node definitions table shows all the child nodes for the selected node type definition.

context.title: CND Editor
context.description: The CND editor is used to edit compact node type definitions (*.cnd files). A CND consists of namespace mappings and node type definitions.

context.title: CND Preference Page
context.description: The CND preference page is used to edit CND notation settings.

context.title: CND Editor's Namespace Editor
context.description: The namespace mapping editor is used to create and edit namespace mappings.

context.title: CND Editor's Namespace Table
context.description: The namespace mappings table shows all the namespaces registered in the CND.

context.title: CND Editor's Node Types Table
context.description: The node type definitions table shows all the node types defined in the CND. A node type definitions may contain property definitions and child node definitions.

context.title: CND Editor's Property Editor
context.description: The property definition editor is used to create and edit property definitions.

context.title: CND Editor's Properties Table
context.description: The property definitions table shows all the properties for the selected node type definition.
